name: ADVENTURE FLIGHT EDUCATION AND SPORTS, INC.
about: Adventure Flight Education and Sports, Inc. is a premier flight school in the Philippines, dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training. We pride ourselves on being the only flight school in the country with Cessna-172s equipped with Continental diesel engines, enhancing safety and efficiency. Our fleet also includes traditional Cessna-152 trainer aircraft. With a team of experienced instructors, we offer comprehensive training programs including Private Pilot Licence, Commercial Pilot Licence, and Instrument Rating. Our maintenance team ensures the highest safety standards for all flights. We tailor our training methods to each student's unique needs, ensuring every flight hour contributes to their skill and confidence. Join us to earn your wings with safety, precision, and excellence.
